trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract class from which all implementations of keyed hash algorithms must derive.
trans-unit.target: 显示所有加密哈希算法实现均必须从中派生的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Hash functions map binary strings of an arbitrary length to small binary strings of a fixed length.
trans-unit.target: 哈希函数的二进制字符串映射到固定长度的小型二进制字符串的任意长度。

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic hash function has the property that it is computationally infeasible to find two distinct inputs that hash to the same value.
trans-unit.target: 加密哈希函数具有它为无法以计算方式找到哈希处理为相同的值的两个不同的输入的属性。

trans-unit.source: Small changes to the data result in large, unpredictable changes in the hash.
trans-unit.target: 中的哈希的大型、 不可预测更改的数据结果的小改动。

trans-unit.source: A keyed hash algorithm is a key-dependent, one-way hash function used as a message authentication code.
trans-unit.target: 加密哈希算法是用作消息验证代码依赖于密钥的性质，单向哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: Only someone who knows the key can verify the hash.
trans-unit.target: 只有知道该密钥的人可以验证哈希。

trans-unit.source: Keyed hash algorithms provide authenticity without secrecy.
trans-unit.target: 加密哈希算法提供没有机密的真实性。

trans-unit.source: Hash functions are commonly used with digital signatures and for data integrity.
trans-unit.target: 哈希函数通常用于使用数字签名以及用于数据完整性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1> class is an example of a keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1>类是一个示例的加密哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 无法创建抽象类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Application code creates a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码创建派生类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of an implementation of a keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建加密哈希算法实现的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the default implementation of a keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建加密哈希算法的默认实现的实例。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1" /> instance, unless the default settings have been changed.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1" /> 实例，除非已更改默认设置。

trans-unit.source: By default, this overload uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1> implementation of a keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此重载使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1>加密哈希算法的实现。

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a different implementation, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Create%28System.String%29> overload, which lets you specify an algorithm name, instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要指定不同的实现，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Create%28System.String%29>重载，它可让你改为指定算法名称。

trans-unit.source: The cryptography configuration system defines the default implementation of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm> class.
trans-unit.target: 加密配置系统定义的默认实现<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>类。

trans-unit.source: The keyed hash algorithm implementation to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的加密哈希算法实现。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the valid values for the <c>algName</c> parameter and the algorithms they map to.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <c>algName</c> 参数的有效值以及它们映射到的算法。

trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term>参数值

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified implementation of a keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 创建加密哈希算法的指定实现的实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified keyed hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定的加密哈希算法的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This method supports a number of algorithms, including MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and RIPEMD160.
trans-unit.target: 此方法支持大量的算法，包括 MD5、 SHA 1、 SHA 256 个字节和 RIPEMD160。

trans-unit.source: For a full list, see the supported values for the `algName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 完整列表，请参阅支持的值`algName`参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize` 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请注意不要引用在以前调用之前释放对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see langword="Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see langword="Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key to use in the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于哈希算法的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The key to use in the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 用于哈希算法的密钥。

trans-unit.source: This property is the public accessor for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.KeyValue> field.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是公共访问器<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.KeyValue>字段。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Key%2A> property to retrieve the key used in the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Key%2A>属性，以检索在当前使用的密钥<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm>类。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to change the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Key" /> property after hashing has begun.
trans-unit.target: 尝试在哈希计算已开始后更改 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Key" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The key to use in the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 用于哈希算法的密钥。

trans-unit.source: This field is accessed through the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Key%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问此字段<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.KeyedHashAlgorithm.Key%2A>属性。
